definition: background/bottom/base/end (of the month, year etc)/remnants/(math.) radix/base
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
right in front of sb's eyes/right under sb's nose/current/at the moment
lit. under a big tree the shade is plentiful (idiom)/fig. to benefit by proximity to an influential person
pinyin: da4 shu4 di3 xia4 hao3 cheng2 liang2

definition: in front of one's eyes/in full view as a panorama/right now

sentences.english: The children are playing under the tree.
Cosette had emerged from under the table.
sentences.chinese: 珂赛特从桌子底下钻出来。

sentences.english: I can creep under the door.
She bent her mouth to the tap and drank the tepid water.
sentences.chinese: 她把嘴伸到水龙头底下去喝那微温的水。

sentences.english: There was a bike under the tree just now.
sentences.chinese: 刚才树底下有辆自行车。

sentences.english: Gets and sets the number of items in the subtree under this group.
sentences.chinese: 取得及设定这个群组底下树状子目录中的项目数。

sentences.english: Also, stitch the edge of the window screen which is between the lower circle and the flank of the cone.
sentences.chinese: 同样，缝住底下的那个圈和圆锥侧面的纱窗边缘。

sentences.english: You can toss it under the bed, turn out the light, and head into dreamland.
sentences.chinese: 把它丢到床底下，关上灯，进入你自己的梦乡。

sentences.english: There are two women in the park. The one under the tree is my friend.
sentences.chinese: 公园里有两个女人，在树底下的那位是我的朋友。

sentences.english: The bear clawed snow, hey, snow has a sweet potato.
sentences.chinese: 小熊扒开雪，嘿，雪底下有一只白薯。

sentences.english: A little boat is now under the bridge.
sentences.chinese: 现在刚好有只船在桥底下。

sentences.english: In the car accident he lost feeling below the waist.
sentences.chinese: 这次车祸使他腰部底下全无知觉。

sentences.english: And there he saw two fuzzy brown ears sticking up from under the cover.
sentences.chinese: 他看到床盖底下露出了两只毛茸茸的棕色耳朵。

sentences.english: They were embezzling funds right under his nose.
sentences.chinese: 他们就在他眼皮子底下把公款贪污了。

sentences.english: You will get sunburnt if you expose your skin to the sun too long.
sentences.chinese: 如果你将皮肤暴露在太阳底下太久，会被晒伤的。

definition: the top/above/overhead/upwards/the top margin/above-mentioned/those higher up
outside/outer surface/abroad/place other than one's home
above/on top of/on the surface of
(of alcohol) to go to one's head/(old) (of a bride-to-be) to bind one's hair into a bun/(of a prostitute) to receive a patron for the first time
outside (also pr. [wai4 mian5] for this sense)/surface/exterior/external appearance
